lead_paragraph: CAHILL--Catherine. The staff and Board of the Film Society of Lincoln Center are deeply saddened to learn of the passing of Catherine Cahill. Catherine and her husband William L. Bernhard, a Director Emeritus of the Film Society and one of its longest serving leaders, have long enjoyed the New York Film Festival and have provided unfailing support of our programs and campaigns. We send our love and condolences to Catherine's husband, William L. Bernhard. Ann Tenenbaum, Chairman; Daniel H. Stern, President; Lesli Klainberg, Exec. Dir. 1/3
